sentences.en: At the end, Late Empire had achieved a resplendence and wealth that could scarcely be surpassed.
sentences.cn: 直到最后, “晚期帝国风格”就其富丽堂皇而论已成为难以超越的了.

sentences.en: Both the centuries - old history and unique location accomplish the resplendence of Romanian wine.
sentences.cn: 悠久的酿造历史,独特的地理环境,铸就了罗马尼亚葡萄酒的辉煌.

sentences.en: Hope all of us hand in hand to move forward , and mutually create resplendence.
sentences.cn: 公司全体人员竭诚欢迎中外客户前来洽谈合作,愿我们携手并进, 共创辉煌!

sentences.en: Kallio company general manager Wujianxing expects to cooperate with all circles, to resplendence hand in hand.
sentences.cn: 公司总经理吴建兴愿与各界人人士竭诚合作,携手进步, 共创辉煌.

sentences.en: Let us advance together and create resplendence, please struggle to our fine tomorrow hand in hand!
sentences.cn: 让我们携手共进,共创辉煌, 为共同拥有美好的明天而奋斗!

sentences.en: Let's cooperate sincerely to create mutual resplendence.
sentences.cn: 让我们真诚携手合作,共创辉煌!

sentences.en: Let's create the warm resplendence together, and greet the polychrome spring.
sentences.cn: 让我们共同创造温暖的辉煌，迎接万紫千红的春天。

sentences.en: LiBo manager welcome all circles to review and instruct, establish resplendence ardently.
sentences.cn: 公司总经理李波热烈欢迎各界朋友前来考察指导, 共创辉煌.

sentences.en: Modern Financial Theory (MFT) is facing more and more challenges after its resplendence , and among them is herding of stock market traders.
sentences.cn: 现代金融理论在经历辉煌之后正面临越来越多的挑战，证券市场交易者的羊群行为就是其中之一。

sentences.en: QiXianFeng manager welcome all circles to review and instruct, establish resplendence ardently.
sentences.cn: 公司总经理齐先锋热烈欢迎各界朋友前来考察指导, 共创辉煌.

sentences.en: Sincerely welcome the clients of home and abroad to cooperate and create resplendence together.
sentences.cn: 我们真诚地欢迎国内外各地客商携手合作,共创辉煌!

sentences.en: The moment Resplendence is willing to dance with Dark, she can really bloom her most beauty.
sentences.cn: 当缤纷甘心与漆黑翩翩起舞, 她才绽放了她的最美.

sentences.en: The most profound darkness is in reality, born from resplendence.
sentences.cn: 最深的黑暗, 往往来自最光明的地方.

sentences.en: Water can congeal to be ice, sweat can congeal to be resplendence.
sentences.cn: 人生格言水凝固成冰, 汗水凝固成辉煌!

sentences.en: We do not pursue one resplendence but development for ever.
sentences.cn: 我们不求一时之辉煌，但求永远的发展。

sentences.en: We warmly welcome all the clients to visit and cooperate with us for creating resplendence together.
sentences.cn: 热忱欢迎新老客户光临指导,携手合作,共创辉煌.

sentences.en: Welcome global customers to visit us and expect common development with you to co - create resplendence.
sentences.cn: 竭诚欢迎全球的客商莅临惠顾,同谋发展,共创辉煌!

sentences.en: Welcome to join us, let us hand in hand to create our resplendence!
sentences.cn: 欢迎您的加盟, 让我们一起携手奋进!
